answers.answer: I started showing extremely early with this pregnancy. At 24weeks with this pregnancy i was the exact same size as the week i had my son at 35weeks. I never got that big with my first though. Im anxious to see how big i will get with this pregnancy. With my first i could see my feet thru the entire pregnancy. Im hoping i get way bigger with this one. Lol. I don't like people referring to me as small.
Lol!! Girl you crack me up! Why in the world would you wanna be huge?! I was so big with my first that I got put on bed rest at 6 months till birth! It was bad lol.

I just don't like when people say Im small. Lol. They think since Im so small that my pregnancy isn't as bad. Pains and uncomfortable wise. With my first i didn't get a small belly till 28weeks and then i didn't get much bigger. But i did gain 75lbs my entire pregnancy due to preeclampsia. I got fully back to my prepregnancy size 2weeks after i delivered. All my friends said i had an easy way out since i didn't get big and i had a c section.With my son i had so many complications and he wasn't growing the best. He was born at 35weeks and weighed 4lb 7oz. I guess i keep thinking if my belly gets huge than i know my daughter is growing and is healthy. Im shooting for a big baby too. Lol.

Oh my gosh! Ugh those people make me so mad! Like we are less womanly because our babies were cut out?! Grr! I'd love to take the easy way out and just push my kid out! So many people give me attitude about it. It's like, if you didn't have a csection then you have noooo idea what I went through. Ugh..people..lol! I completely understand about being smaller though..that's how I am with this pregnancy. No one even knows I'm prego unless I tell them. Hopefully that belly will pop out for you girl. I know that must to go the entire pregnancy with everyone thinking that you are fine, when you're really not. People just can't see the tears we hide behind our eyes sometimes. Again..stupid people..lol!
I m 29 weeks, showing high..I love being pregnant.,.love when people notice my belly....I god pregnant after many trial thats why I want to rnjoy each and every moment,,..,
Im 28 weeks and have a really huge bump. I was a size8-10 now I wear a 12. My boobs have not grown at all. I started showing around 12 weeks actually.

question: I'm 25 weeks and I am starting to really pop out! My belly is super high and really hard! I have very large boobs (about a G-H) and before I got prego I was a size 12 in jeans. I've gained 10 pounds so far and seriously think it's all my boobs lol. Anyways! Just wondering if my belly is supposed to be sticking out already? I started showing at 13 weeks with my first baby, he was very large. I started showing at 18-19 weeks with this baby.
title: how big is your belly?
